mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.tree_leaf AS "treeLeaf", a.tree_level AS "treeLevel", a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parentName", b.label AS "label"
LEFT JOIN sys_area p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict b ON b.type='sys_area_type' and b.value= a.type
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_area a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_area( id, parent_id, parent_ids, code, name, sort, type, tree_leaf, tree_level, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{treeLeaf}, #{treeLevel}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_area SET parent_id = #{parentId}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, type = #{type}, tree_leaf = #{treeLeaf}, tree_level = #{treeLevel}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_area SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
